content: do you have one skein of yarn you ve been saving for just the right thing only have a small amount of time in which to knit a gift this cowl works up in a matter of hours you start at the bottom center working upward and increasing the number of stitches as you go you start out working flat back and forth but then ultimately you will join and work the rest in the round if you loved my gallatin scarf 1 you ll love this cowl the lace aspect is the same as the gallatin hope you enjoy now available in the following languages english spanish polish and portuguese click on the blog link for the pattern like kriskrafter on facebook to get updates on new patterns discussions etc kriskrafter 2 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/gallatin-scarf 2 https //www facebook com/kriskrafter
